CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 然而；尽管如此；不过；无论如何；不管怎样；不论多么；以任何方式；不管用什么方法；不管到什么程度；不论怎样
然而；尽管如此；不过；无论如何；不管怎样；即使如此；虽然如此；不论怎样

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。
口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系，语气稍弱于but，连接性也弱一些，因而常作插入语。
语气强，多用于肯定句或疑问句。指尽管作出让步，采取措施或表示反对，但情况仍然如故，无所改变。
表对比，一般可与whereas换用，但程度弱一些。
常用于否定句，语气比still稍强。指不管作出多大努力或让步，仍达不到预期的结果。

bilingual.source: A lot of people ride bikes, however.
However, she has some bad habits, too.
bilingual.target: 然而，她也有一些坏习惯。
然而，并不是所有事情都是坏的。
然而，林医生拒绝了这个提议。
然而，铅中毒是不可逆的。
然而，他们也有一些不同之处。

bilingual.source: However, they can take up a lot of time.
bilingual.target: 然而，它们可能会占用很多时间。

list.abstract: however（英[haʊˈevə]，美[haʊˈevər]），英语单词，作副词为然而；可是；不过。作连词为不管怎么；无论如何。例句为“In the high-fear group, however, the brain area that was activated was different.（然而，在高度恐惧人群中，大脑被激活的区域是不同的。）” however相关近义词有anyway、at all events等。

yingyinNormal.en: However, the components of the universe can still affect its eventual fate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而组成宇宙的各个部分同时也会影响其最终的命运。

yingyinNormal.en: Social protocol does, however, require me to bring you a hot beverage in your time of need.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而鉴于人际交往的需要，我应该在你孤独的时候给你来杯热饮。

yingyinNormal.en: However, our examination of the vehicle did reveal a small amount of blood on the passenger side dashboard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我们检查了车辆并且在副驾驶仪表盘上发现了少量血液。

yingyinNormal.en: Did my sister give that impression? No! No. There was, however, I have to admit, the matter of your family...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我姐姐给你那种印象？不！不。有，然而，我不得不承认你的家人……

yingyinNormal.en: However, we also believe that the universe had another phase of de Sitter expansion in the earliest times of its life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我们也相信宇宙还存在另一个德西特膨胀阶段，它发生在宇宙形成的初期。

yingyinNormal.en: However, not every opinion is equally valuable. And we had to learn to distinguish between good ideas and bad ones to get the best decisions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而并不是每个观点都一样有价值。我们要学会区分好坏做出最佳决策。

yingyinNormal.en: However, I also learned that if you get swept up by what you are on the outside you can lose who you are on the inside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，我也学到了一点，那就是如果你完全沉溺于自己的外在，你就会丢掉内在的自己。

yingyinNormal.en: However, it doesn't look like I'm gonna get this job, so I can't afford to have principles. So screw you! The tickets are ours!
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，看起来我好像得不到这份工作了，所以我不能太有原则，去你们的！彩票是我们的！

yingyinNormal.en: However, after much deliberation, I have decided that I have more to offer you as Secretary of State than to resign and run for office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，经过深思熟虑，我决定，与辞职参加选举相比，作为国务卿我能更好地为大家服务。

yingyinNormal.en: However, if crew moral is better served by my roaming the halls weeping, I would gladly defer to your medical expertise. Excuse me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，如果大家能在我的指挥下忠诚地为星舰服务的话，我会很高兴接受你的专业医疗意见的。

yingyinNormal.en: However, economist David Ricardo showed that international trade could actually make everyone better off, bringing in one of the first great economic models.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，经济学家戴维?李嘉图指出国际贸易时实际上能让大家都受益，带出早期伟大的经济理念之一。

yingyinNormal.en: My arduous journey, however, was for naught. Although advertised to appear, he did not show up. It was at that moment, I vowed eternal hatred for Wil Wheaton.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而我艰苦的旅行却一无所获，尽管广告说他会出现，却最终没来，就在那一刻，我发誓要永远憎恨威尔·惠顿。

yingyinNormal.en: However, this treatment remains fairly controversial as studies on rats and monkeys have shown that even small amounts of MDMA can not only destroy the endings of brain cells involved in the release of serotonin but potentially cause permanent brain damage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，这种疗法现在还很有争议，因为对老鼠和猴子进行药物测试发现，摇头丸不只会破坏那些制造复合胺的脑细胞，还极有可能造成大脑永久损坏。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, golly, however did he humiliate you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，他怎么羞辱你了？

yingyinNormal.en: Iracebeth, please. However would you stop people from laughing?
yingyinNormal.zh: 伊瑞瑟贝斯，拜托.别人要笑你能阻挡得了吗？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: However, that blue represents millions of dollars and countless jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，那蓝色值几千万花费了数不尽的心血。

yingyinNormal.en: This look like affection to you? I takes it however I gets it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这看起来是表达爱意吗？我怎么理解就怎么说喽。

yingyinNormal.en: However, on an unrelated topic, I am never getting out of this bed again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是，从另一个方面讲，我再也抬不起头做人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Giving Mrs. Davis the box set of Roots was bad. However... No. Fine. Bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给戴维斯女士《根》影集的这种行为，好无礼。但是... 不行。好吧，好无礼。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, excuse me, that is my mother you're talking about, however accurately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 喂喂喂，你刚才说的人可是我母亲，虽然描述十分正确。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 无论如何; 不管怎样

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Unhealthy curiosity is possible to resist, <highlight>however</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，我们是可以抵制不健康的好奇心的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, there is another important part of the jobs picture that was largely overlooked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，就业前景的另一个重要部分在很大程度上被忽视了。

examination_example.sentence: As the industry advances, <highlight>however</highlight>, other suits may have an even greater impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着该行业的发展，其他诉讼可能会产生更大的影响。

sense_info_list.zh: 无论如何; 不管怎样

examination_example.sentence: A sacred place of peace, <highlight>however</highlight> crude it may be, is a distinctly human need, as opposed to shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类所需要的明显是一个和平的圣地，不管它有多么粗陋，与收容所截然不同。

word_usage.usage: however作副词时，可与形容词或副词连用，表示“无论到什么程度”，如：He wanted to take no risks, however small.  他不想冒任何风险，不管风险有多小。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 无论如何; 不管怎样

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, conflict between characters is often depicted with characters being unkind to each other or they may use aggressive tactics with each other.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，角色之间的冲突经常被描绘成角色之间互相不友好，或者他们可能互相使用攻击性的策略。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, if the findings are true, they suggest that optimism could serve as a psychological trait that promotes health and a longer life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果这些发现是真的，它们表明，乐观可以作为一种促进健康和长寿的心理特征。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, our focus on countries can mask broad variations within them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，我们对国家的关注可能掩盖了国家内部的广泛差异。

sense_info_list.zh: 无论如何; 不管怎样

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 口语常用词, 语气较强, 泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系, 语气 however< but 因而常作插入语。
指尽管作出完全让步, 也不会发生任何影响。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 无论如何; 不管怎样

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, many people tend to go to extremes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，许多人倾向于走极端。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, it's not long before the mice begin to catch on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，老鼠不久后就开始理解。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, he points out that many countries have not done so.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，他指出，许多国家还没有这样做。

sense_info_list.zh: 无论如何; 不管怎样

word_usage.usage:
①用作副词，意为“然而”，可置于句首或句中，但需用逗号与句子其他成分隔开：
I’d like to go with you; however, I've much work to do.
我很想和你一起去，可是我有许多工作要做。
②用作连词，意为“不管怎样，无论如何”，引导让步状语从句：
He can go there however he likes.
他爱怎么去就怎么去。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系，语气 however< but 因而常作插入语。
指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, most people don't regard pronunciation as a very important part of communication skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，大多数人并不认为发音是沟通技巧中非常重要的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: For many who made it to Dawson, <highlight>however</highlight>, the rewards were worth the difficult trip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，对于许多成功到达道森的人来说，这趟艰难的旅程是值得的。

examination_example.sentence: This time, <highlight>however</highlight>, the cleanup was a little different.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，这次的清理工作有点不同。

word_usage.usage:
①用作副词，意为“然而”，可置于句首或句中，但需用逗号与句子其他成分隔开：
I’d like to go with you; however, I've much work to do.
我很想和你一起去，可是我有许多工作要做。
②用作连词，意为“不管怎样，无论如何”，引导让步状语从句：
He can go there however he likes.
他爱怎么去就怎么去。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 口语常用词，语气较强，泛指与前述情况相反。
表转折关系，语气 however< but 因而常作插入语。
指尽管作出完全让步，也不会发生任何影响。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 然而; 不过; 仍然
不管怎样; 无论如何

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 然而; 不过; 仍然

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, all kinds of these laws are not unified.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这些法律并不统一。

examination_example.sentence: The solar panel, <highlight>however</highlight>, does not make much electricity from falling rain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，太阳能电池板并不能从雨水中发电

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>However</highlight>, there are also causes for getting too little sleep．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，睡眠不足也有原因。

sense_info_list.zh: 不管怎样; 无论如何

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 从语义上看：but表示非常明显的对比，转折的意味比however强；从语序上看：but总是位于它所引出的分句之首。
从语法上看：but是并列连词，however是副词；从语序上看：however可以位于分句之首、之中或之后。
